ModMetaData.name: Manure Bricks VEF
ModMetaData.author: Xeyeco
ModMetaData.description:
Adds Manure Bricks. Needs Vanilla Expanded Framework and Dubs Bad Hygiene.
this is a addition to the Ceramics VEF mod, but its possible to run without it.
Acknowledgements Thanks to N7Huntsman for the original Ceramics mod. Thanks to Owlchemist for his VEF mod versions, what inspired me. And Last but not least Thanks to Oskar Potocki and all of the Vanilla Expanded Framework Team for their great Work.
